title: bhakthi biccha miyyavE baavukamagu sattvika
sahitya:
bhakti biccamiyyavE bhAvukamagu sAttvika 







anupallavi







mukti kakhila shaktiki trimUrtula katimElmi rAma 







caraNam







prAnamu lEni vAniki bangAru pAga cuTTi Ani vajra bhUSaNa



muramandu beTTu rIti jAnalaku



purANAgama shAstra vEda japa prasanga trANa galgi yEmi bhakta



tyAgarAjanuta rAma
